alert.note: Alert for Elbert; Lincoln (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 04 at 4:44PM MDT until August 04 at 5:15PM MDT by NWS Boulder
info.description: The National Weather Service in Denver Colorado has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Elbert County in east central Colorado... Central Lincoln County in east central Colorado... * Until 515 PM MDT. * At 444 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 7 miles northwest of Kutch, or 22 miles southwest of Limon, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Kutch around 500 PM MDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Punkin Center. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
